metadata.name: Me Dance
metadata.description:
A bit about this piece....

Life will spread you thin and pull you in a million directions. Things will come up, time will most certainly continue, and your responsibilities will likely not be going anywhere anytime soon. Whether your version of a "Me Day" is reading a book by a pool or climbing Mount Everest.... just freaking.... do.... it.... We all deserve a minute to ourselves, to breathe, to reflect, to unapologetically speak in weird accents to our dogs. Live life and give your whole heart to the one's you love but do not forget to be kind to yourself.

This piece for me was a journey and a half. I yelled, I laughed, I smiled, I cursed my computer harder than ever before; but most importantly, I made this. Here we are five weeks after Exotic Heroes launch with the best community a founder could ask for and I couldn't be more honored to bring to you the first ever Exotic one of one ... "Me Dance" .
